column2: was a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] and mythical literature society in Australia. This society was presumably an Australian counterpart of the US based [[Mythopoeic Society]].

column1: As of 2011 only scattered references to this society can be found.<ref>http://arts.monash.edu.au/ecps/assets/docs/cv-peter-groves.pdf (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref> It is therefore assumed that this society is now defunct. This society appears to have been active from the mid 1980s through the early 1990s.

column3: their Influence'': Proceedings of the Second Annual Conference of the Inner Ring
column4: the Mythopoeic Literature Society of Australia

column1: * [[1992]]: ''Imaginings: the Eighth Annual Conference of the Inner Ring'': The Mythopoeic Literature Society of Australia
